headline: Show HN: Goose – A Background Job Processing Library for Clojure
description:
Documentation can be found in README or Wiki - https://github.com/nilenso/goose/wiki

Features: Scheduling, Error Handling & Retries, API to manage Jobs,

Reach out to us on #goose in the Clojurians Slack if you need any help -https://clojurians.slack.com/channels/goose
